sentences.en: A dog that barks constantly can be a source of annoyance to the neighbours.
sentences.cn: 吠个不停的狗会惹邻居烦恼.

sentences.en: A look of annoyance crossed her face.
sentences.cn: 她的脸上掠过一丝不快。

sentences.en: He could not conceal his annoyance at being interrupted.
He denied there was any annoyance with the British among other EC members.
sentences.cn: 他否认其他欧盟委员会委员对英国人有不满。

sentences.en: He turned and faced her, faint annoyance wrinkling his forehead.
sentences.cn: "他转过身来看着思嘉,心里有些不高兴, 额头和眉毛皱起来.

sentences.en: His annoyance showed itself in his face.
sentences.cn: 从他的脸上可以看出他有烦恼.

sentences.en: I felt annoyance at being teased.

sentences.cn: 等得不耐烦的驾驶员嘟嘟鸣笛表示不满.

sentences.en: Inconsiderate neighbours can be more than an annoyance.
sentences.cn: 不为他人着想的邻居会非常惹人厌。

sentences.en: It would spare your Majesty all fear of future annoyance.
sentences.cn: 这样就免得陛下害怕将来发生麻烦了.
妈妈不耐烦地抬起头来.

sentences.en: Odorous pollutants can cause minor annoyance.
sentences.cn: 臭气污染物可以引起不严重的厌烦.

sentences.en: She began to find the old man's constant presence a source of growing annoyance.
sentences.cn: 她开始觉得老人常常守在眼前简直是眼中钉.

sentences.en: The problems were an annoyance, but we managed to cope.
sentences.cn: 这些问题很讨厌，但是我们都设法解决了。

sentences.en: Why do you always take your annoyance out on me?
sentences.cn: 为什么你不高兴时总是对我出气?

words.tran_cn: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 生气，烦恼，令人烦恼的事物
